meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of hagiography.
meanings.sent1: The book contained a hagiographical account of the saint's life.
meanings.sent2: The writer's hagiographical style painted a perfect picture of the hero.
meanings.sent3: The hagiographical description of the character made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her hagiographical words turned the ordinary man into a legend.
meanings.sent5: The hagiographical tale was etched in the minds of all who heard it.

meanings.sent1: The hagiographical portrait made the subject seem flawless.
meanings.sent2: Her hagiographical praise made the recipient blush with joy.
meanings.sent3: The hagiographical speech was so over-the-top that it became comical.
meanings.sent4: His hagiographical words transformed a simple act into a grand gesture.
meanings.sent5: The hagiographical language used was almost too perfect to believe.
